Company description
HRH International Exports has been exporting British grocery & confectionery products since 1987. Initially exporting to European markets, but more recently, specializing in supplying wholesale distribution companies in the United States, Canada and the far east.
The company has expanded considerably in recent years, and as a result we are now looking to employ a warehouse manager to assist with the day to day running of the warehouse.
Job Summary
We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Warehouse Manager with FLT experience to oversee our warehouse operations. The ideal candidate will be responsible for ensuring the efficient management of inventory, logistics, and supply chain processes. This role requires a strong focus on continuous improvement and the ability to manage profit and loss effectively. The Warehouse Manager will lead a team, implement best practices, and ensure compliance with safety regulations while optimising warehouse performance.
Responsibilities
Oversee daily warehouse operations, ensuring efficiency and productivity.
Manage inventory control processes to maintain optimal stock levels.
Implement and monitor warehouse management systems (WMS) for effective tracking of goods.
Collaborate with the supply chain teams to streamline logistics and transportation.
Develop and enforce policies and procedures to enhance operational efficiency.
Coordinate with third-party logistics (3PL) providers to ensure seamless operations.
Handle the booking in and booking out procedure
Skills
Strong knowledge of supply chain management principles.
Proven experience in warehouse management
Fork Lift truck Licence
Understanding of third-party logistics (3PL) operations.
Excellent organisational skills with a focus on business processes.
Strong leadership abilities and team management skills.
Effective communication skills, both verbal and written.
Join our team as a Warehouse Manager and play a crucial role in optimising our operations while leading a dedicated team towards success.
Job Types: Full-time, Permanent
Pay: From £30,000.00 per year
Benefits:
Company pension
Free parking
On-site parking
Schedule:
8 hour shift
Monday to Friday
Experience:
Warehouse Management: 1 year (preferred)
Work Location: In person
Application deadline: 10/12/2024
Expected start date: 15/12/2024
